name: TransienT (grungi)
description:
Transient is an Action / Puzzle Game in which you’re playing a NPC trapped in memory after his game ended. His only hope is trying to reach the mythical "Disk", rumored to be the only safe haven in the face of the world ending.

You need to survive as long as possible, changing the world around you as you move from zone to zone, trying to save other NPCs trapped with you. All the while, the memory you live in will become more and more instable... There might not be a way to win, but how high of a score can you obtain before your demise?

This project was made during the Blending Jam 19 in Brussels in 2 days.
The theme was "the end of the world".

How to play:
Arrow keys: Move
Spacebar: Glitch nearby tiles

Credits:

Voxel art: Billford & David Collignon https://twitter.com/david_collignon

Code: Bastien "Grungi" Gorissen https://twitter.com/b_gorissen

Music: Bastien "Grungi" Gorissen

SFX: Billford https://twitter.com/3ill3

Feedback always welcome.

Like, share.

Thanksfor playing.
